analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/7/0xeeaf33534f7e8628b281da3aa01271d4ce22619d.sol:
	Contract SPZToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0xeeaf33534f7e8628b281da3aa01271d4ce22619d.sol#242-243)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
